info.gloss: marks preceding phrase as modifier of following phrase; it, him her, them; go to

words: in a word; in short; in brief / anyway; anyhow
the most pressing matter of the moment; a top priority task; urgent matter
whereas...; on the other hand ...; conversely ...

fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom to act); trouble back at home; worries about the future consequences; often in negative expressions, meaning no worries about anything
during; at the time of; the time when something happens
extraWords: before; prior to; ago; previously; beforehand
one of (sth); one out of a multitude; one (third, quarter, percent etc)
inside; among; in the midst of (doing sth); during
(after a noun N and before a predicate P) the reason why N P; Example: 我之所以討厭他|我之所以讨厌他[wo3 zhi1 suo3 yi3 tao3 yan4 ta1] "the reason why I dislike him (is ...)"
apart from this; in addition to this
a hundred percent; out and out; absolutely
